mapper.select: SELECT a.movie_id,a.movie_name,a.movie_age,a.movie_genre,a.movie_runtime,a.movie_summary,a.movie_poster_img,a.movie_back_img,a.movie_release,NVL(ROUND(AVG(b.review_like),1),0) AS movie_Like FROM DT_MOVIE a, dt_review b WHERE a.movie_id = b.movie_id(+) group by a.movie_id, a.movie_name, a.movie_age, a.movie_genre, a.movie_runtime, a.movie_summary, a.movie_poster_img, a.movie_back_img, a.movie_release order by movie_id
mapper.insert:
SELECT max(movie_id) + 1 as movie_id FROM dt_movie
INSERT INTO DT_MOVIE (movie_id , movie_name , movie_age , movie_genre , movie_runtime , movie_summary , movie_poster_img , movie_back_img , movie_release) VALUES (#{movieId} , #{movieName} , #{movieAge} , #{movieGenre} , #{movieRuntime} , #{movieSummary} , #{moviePosterImg} , #{movieBackImg} , #{movieRelease})
